job_tasks.phrase: Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the application and integration of generative AI technologies, which falls under the broader scope of modeling and applying AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers to Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions researching, designing, and developing generative AI algorithms, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working and rapidly share them across teams and leadership
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding customer adoption and sharing insights across teams, indicating a need to comprehend business context and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This task requires understanding customer business problems and guiding them on AI solutions, highlighting business understanding and customer interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform
job_tasks.justification: Creating and delivering technical assets, especially reusable ones for adoption, implies software development and integration work.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
job_tasks.justification: The creation of sample code and technical assets points towards software development activities, even if shared in a communication context.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction.
job_tasks.justification: This involves gathering and relaying feedback to influence product strategy, which is a key aspect of business understanding and market alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers
deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers
guide customer on adoption patterns and paths
Create and deliver reusable technical assets
Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations
adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams
help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions
understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working
help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the research, design, and development of generative AI algorithms and their application into user-facing systems. It also highlights customer interaction for understanding business problems and guiding AI solution implementation, aligning perfectly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's focus on language, vision, and interaction specialists.
